response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which holds immense value for us and I believe it will do the same for you. Given its worth to us, we are considering offering it to you at a special price. We propose to sell the product to you for $1,100,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing our return on investment and ensuring that you receive a valuable asset at an attractive cost. We hope this offer aligns with your expectations and interests. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
